name: Garden Grower (caitlinkeating)
description:
Welcome to your own personal garden! A little empty, isn't it? 

Grow your very own garden by collecting natural rain in your backyard. Purchase tier 1 buildings to help increase your rain drop count, then buy tier 2/tier 3 buildings to beautify your garden. 

Building Key:

  • 50 = Buy a piece of grass for your garden. Produces no effect, but looks cool.
  • 100 = Buy a star for your sky that will deflect raindrops towards your bucket. 
  • 150 = Buy your own personal cloud. Produces 1 rain drop every 2 seconds. 
  • 500 = A beautiful yellow flower! 
  • 750 = A beautiful blue flower! Taller!
  • 1,000 = A beautiful red flower! Even taller! 
  • 2,000 = Pink background accent.
  • 4,000 = Orange background accent.
  • 6,000 = Blue background accent.
  • 10,000 = Purple background accent.
